job description:
Description:
Are you a Data Engineer that can QA your own work? That’s a plus for this role!

THE ROLE

The ideal candidate will possess:
  • Individual should have expert knowledge of one or more technical/business domains, be able to interact across functional boundaries, and explore emerging technologies, documenting standards and procedures for their usage
  • Must have proficiency with relational databases and expertise in data integration and data quality development, as well as data management standards and concepts
  • Two or more years of experience using CVENT
  • Experience with/exposure to Salesforce, and, in particular, experience with Salesforce data loader and building reports in Salesforce
  • Troubleshooting/Helpdesk/Tier One customer-service experience a plus
  • Ability to QA one’s own work a plus
  • Experience with data management, data cleaning, data visualization and report creation
  • Experience researching and implementing new technical products
  • Experience managing relationships with technical vendors
  • Detail-oriented a plus
  • Advanced excel including pivot tables, formulas, data-cleaning techniques, data visualization – pivot charts and graphs, etc.
The person who secures this position will:
  • The data engineer will drive complex assignments from a technical perspective, and provide analysis and guidance to development efforts surrounding information usage, interdependencies, and security as required
